Description.Name: SHIELD (S)
Description.Details: A natural evolution of the old CASE system that the Sanctuary Worlders took with them on their exodus from the Inner Sphere, the SHIELD system is an advanced CASE-like system. Essentially the same principle as Inner Sphere CASE, the SHIELD is a series of interlocking and overlapping armor plates that surround explosive components such as ammunition and expels explosions back out through specially constructed channels to prevent damage to the unit.
